dcterms:creator: Mengxi Wei
Yifan He
Qiong Zhang
dcterms:description: RVL-CDIP consists of 400,000 gray-scale images in 16 classes, with 25,000 images per class. There are 320,000 training images, 40,000 validation images and 40,000 test images.
dcterms:title: RVL-CDIP

dcterms:creator: Minghao Li
Yiheng Xu
Lei Cui
Shaohan Huang
Furu Wei
Zhoujun Li
Ming Zhou
dcterms:description: DocBank contains 500K document pages with fine-grained token-level annotations for document layout analysis. It is constructed using weak supervision from the free LaTeX documents. It contains 400K for training, 50K for validation and 50K for testing.
dcterms:title: DocBank

dcterms:creator: Zilong Wang
Yiheng Xu
Lei Cui
Jingbo Shang
Furu Wei
dcterms:description: ReadingBank is a benchmark dataset for reading order detection built with weak supervision from WORD documents, which contains 500K document images with a wide range of document types as well as the corresponding reading order information.
dcterms:title: ReadingBank

dcterms:creator: Zewen Chi
Heyan Huang
Heng-Da Xu
Houjin Yu
Wanxuan Yin
Xian-Ling Mao
dcterms:description: SciTSR is a large-scale table structure recognition dataset, which contains 15,000 tables in PDF format and their corresponding structure labels obtained from LaTeX source files.
dcterms:title: SciTSR

dcterms:creator: Max Göbel
Tamir Hassan
Ermelinda Oro
Giorgio Orsi
dcterms:description: ICDAR-2013 is collected from digital documents, which contains 156 tables with annotation. Notice that this dataset does not provide training data.
dcterms:title: ICDAR-2013

dcterms:creator: Liangcai Gao
Yilun Huang
Hervé Déjean
Jean-Luc Meunier
Qinqin Yan
Yu Fang
Florian Kleber
Eva Lang
dcterms:description: ICDAR-2019 contains 600 tables for training and 150 tables for testing. These tables are annotated with the ground truth of bounding boxes along with contents.
dcterms:title: ICDAR-2019

dcterms:creator: Guillaume Jaume
Hazim Kemal Ekenel
Jean-Philippe Thiran
dcterms:description: FUNSD consists of 199 real, fully annotated, scanned form images. The dataset is split into 149 training samples and 50 testing samples.
dcterms:title: FUNSD

dcterms:creator: Seunghyun Park
Seung Shin
Bado Lee
Junyeop Lee
Jaeheung Surh
Minjoon Seo
Hwalsuk Lee
dcterms:description: CORD consists of receipts collected from shops and restaurants. It includes 800 receipts for training, 100 for validation, and 100 for testing with OCR annotations provided.
dcterms:title: CORD
